channel.title: How can I fix this?
channel.description:
Okay. Whenever I spawn an item which my client obviously doesen't support, it crashes. How can I make it so that instead of freezing and crashing, it just spawns a "null" object?
Here's the error I get:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14134 at Class8.method198(Class8.java:214) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:270) at client.method105(client.java:8125) at client.method36(client.java:1601) at client.method102(client.java:7848) at client.method9(client.java:8705) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4487) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:680)
[/code]

item.title: How can I fix this?
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Okay. Whenever I spawn an item which my client obviously doesen’t support, it crashes. How can I make it so that instead of freezing and crashing, it just spawns a “null” object?

Here’s the error I get:

[code]Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14134
at Class8.method198(Class8.java:214)
at Class8.method200(Class8.java:270)
at client.method105(client.java:8125)
at client.method36(client.java:1601)
at client.method102(client.java:7848)
at client.method9(client.java:8705)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126)
at client.run(client.java:4487)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:680)

[/code]
